item.title: Report E-2024120235
item.description:
Report E-2024120235

Identified by scraper @ 2024-12-16T12:32:39+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-09
  • City: FRANKLIN
  • State: LA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R & L CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On December 9, 2024, one (1) 55-gallon drum of UN1791 was damaged in transit and released approximately five (5) gallons of product to the trailer interior. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from E3 Environmental (E3) to remediate the impacted site. The crew utilized neutralizing agent, absorbents, and hand tools to remove all UN1791 from the trailer. All waste was containerized in one (1) 55-gallon drum and one (1) 95-gallon overpack for disposal.
